explanation: [0-0] A beige Michelin cake is placed on a white surface. It's topped with a red strawberry and an orange-gold object. Below the cake is a white rectangular box with the words "Michelin Cake" written in black.

[0-4] Next, a person uses their hand to hold a silver-gray mold. They place the mold around the cake and lift it, creating a transparent caramel film that envelops the entire cake. The film is stretched and rotated for display. The video then transitions to the next dessert preparation. Someone uses cartoon-shaped tongs to hold a mold and removes it from a pot. This mold is then placed around a cake decorated with cherry tomatoes, and when lifted, it forms a transparent caramel film. Simultaneously, the words "OMG!!!" appear in white at the top of the screen.

[4-10] Then, a person uses two forks to stretch melted chocolate into strips. They then place the strips upside down on a white plate, showcasing the successfully made chocolate snacks decorated with strawberries, blueberries, and some green leaves. The video transitions to the making of another chocolate decoration. Someone uses a comb to stretch chocolate sauce into strips, placing them on a stick, and then inverting them onto a white plate. This also results in a successful chocolate snack, adorned with some cream, overturned cups, and green food items. The word "Nice" in white and a yellow thumbs-up emoji appear above.

[21-29] After that, the video switches to the preparation of another dessert. A man wearing black plastic film rotates a skewer of tanghulu with his hands, creating a layer of white cotton candy around it. Some machinery and more tanghulu can be seen to the left. Then, someone uses a spoon to drizzle honey onto a rotating beater. When the beater stops, it's covered in a layer of white cotton candy. Someone uses tongs to place the cotton candy onto a skewer of strawberries. The word "meow~" appears in white at the top of the screen.
